name: PINTO {chris pine + zachary quinto}
description: The first (hopefully of many) star trek, spirk, and pinto dash themes. This one obviously features Chris Pine and Zachary Quinto outside of the Star Trek universe. Pretty platonic and classy. Hope it gets some use.
additional_info:
